Introduction

BuzzGuy was developed as part of an educational project in the Georgia Tech Online Master of Science in Computer Science (OMSCS) program. The goal of this project is to support students’ academic motivation and promote well-being by providing a combination of open-ended and guided conversational responses. This app is provided for educational and research purposes only and is not an official Georgia Tech product.
